Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerMtoV, IControllerVtoM, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Controller extends Object implements IControllerVtoM, IControllerMtoV, javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the cafeteria simulation GUI. Implements both IControllerVtoM (view-to-model) and IControllerMtoV (model-to-view) interfaces. Manages UI interactions, simulation control, and updates visualizations and statistics.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller after FXML loading. Sets up event handlers for UI controls and initializes charts.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object

    • startSimulation

      public void startSimulation()
      Starts a new simulation with parameters from the UI. Stops any existing simulation, reads UI values, creates a new engine, and starts the simulation thread.
      Specified by:
      startSimulation in interface IControllerVtoM

    • decreaseSpeed

      public void decreaseSpeed()
      Decreases simulation speed by doubling the delay. Maximum delay is capped at MAX_DELAY.
      Specified by:
      decreaseSpeed in interface IControllerVtoM

    • increaseSpeed

      public void increaseSpeed()
      Increases simulation speed by halving the delay. Minimum delay is capped at MIN_DELAY.
      Specified by:
      increaseSpeed in interface IControllerVtoM

    • showEndTime

      public void showEndTime(double time)
      Shows the simulation end time and displays completion popup. Updates charts with final data. Must be called on JavaFX thread.
      Specified by:
      showEndTime in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      time - The simulation end time in seconds

    • visualiseCustomer

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • visualiseCustomerToPayment

      public void visualiseCustomerToPayment(MealType mealType, PaymentType paymentType, int cashierStationNumber)
      Visualizes a customer moving from meal station to payment station.
      Specified by:
      visualiseCustomerToPayment in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      mealType - The customer's meal type
      paymentType - The payment method (SELF_SERVICE or CASHIER)
      cashierStationNumber - The cashier station number (0=self-service, 1=cashier1, 2=cashier2)

      Parameters:

    • updateQueueDisplays

      public void updateQueueDisplays(int grillQueue, int veganQueue, int normalQueue, int cashierQueue, int cashierQueue2, int selfServiceQueue, int coffeeQueue)
      Updates queue length displays for all service points. Updates progress bars, labels, and collects data for charts.
      Specified by:
      updateQueueDisplays in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      grillQueue - Queue length at grill station
      veganQueue - Queue length at vegan station
      normalQueue - Queue length at normal station
      cashierQueue - Queue length at first cashier station
      cashierQueue2 - Queue length at second cashier station
      selfServiceQueue - Queue length at self-service station
      coffeeQueue - Queue length at coffee station

    • updateStatistics

      public void updateStatistics(double throughput, double avgWaitTime, int peakQueue, double simTime)
      Updates statistics displays with current simulation metrics.
      Specified by:
      updateStatistics in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      throughput - Throughput in customers per hour
      avgWaitTime - Average wait time in seconds
      peakQueue - Peak queue length observed
      simTime - Current simulation time in seconds

    • updateUtilization

      public void updateUtilization(double[] utilizationPercentages, double simTime)
      Updates a progress bar to reflect queue length. Sets progress value and color based on capacity percentage.
      Specified by:
      updateUtilization in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      utilizationPercentages -
      simTime -
